details:
[30-May-2025 18:47:00 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_easy_gallery (Id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL, slug VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, thumbnail LONGTEXT NOT NULL, thumbwidth INT, thumbheight INT, PRIMARY KEY Id (Id) )

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
Error occurred at line 4117 in Function handle_error. Error message was: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.

#8 {main}
for query CREATE TABLE wp_easy_gallery (Id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL, slug VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL, description TEXT NOT NULL, thumbnail LONGTEXT NOT NULL, thumbwidth INT, thumbheight INT, PRIMARY KEY Id (Id) ) made by activate_plugin, do_action('activate_einfache-tabelle/best-free-gallery.php'), WP_Hook->do_action, WP_Hook->apply_filters, easy_gallery_install, dbDelta, WP_SQLite_DB->query, WP_SQLite_DB->print_error
